entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:41 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
